Title: Custom WPF Color Picker Like Office 2007
Description: This is a small WPF user control. It is a custom color picker like Office 2007 that can be used in WPF application for Providing users of the application to pick a color from a predefined pallete and an advanced picker for more custom colors.
HomeWiki:
A Simple and stunning WPF Color Picker similar to that of office 2007

This project is currently in beta mode with a drag feature missing for the advanced color pallete window.

Features in this release :

*Choose from a predefined color list
*Choose custom color from a pallete
*Adjust color opacity in the advanced color pattele
*MS Office 2007 Style looks
